description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 1-8 player dogfighting on one console!  Play against friends or A.I. opponents.  Two players can share each controller.  HOW TO PLAY: Get your pilots to their planes - Shoot planes to earn points - If you lose a pilot you lose their points!
description.short: 1-8 player dogfighting on one console!  Play against friends or A.I. opponents.  Two players can share each controller.  HOW TO PLAY: Get your pilots to their planes - Shoot planes to earn points - If you lose a pilot you lose their points!
